name: Kevin's Adventure (riffraffstudios)
description:
We present to you a BETA version of Riff Raff studios first game, 

Kevin's Adventure!
Become part of this unique narrative where you get to be Kevin.  Join the adventure, explore the island and solve puzzles in order to earn the grand prize.

If you visit the website,  you will find the updated game there, ready to play. This means,  no time wasted on downloading, even better, does not take up storage. All you need is a good internet connection and a browser. 

We hope you enjoy the initial Demo of our game, 

please leave feedback in the comment section of the game. 

Thank you!
